name: Turum-Burum
description:
We increase the revenue of online stores with the help of UX/UI. Since 2009, we've launched 11 of Ukraine's TOP 30 e-commerce projects and 300+ E-commerce projects, Mobile Apps, FinTech, B2B systems with complicated algorithms.
Every our solution is based on numbers and facts or our 10 years of experience. We focus on conversion rate optimization and thinking about business goals first. 
We are trusted by market leaders, our clients are: Intertop, Pampik, Antoshka, Luxoptica, Mon Amie, Brain, Baku Electronics, Gold.ua. 40+ millions of users have tested the interfaces we created.
Don't take our word for it - check out our portfolio: https://turumburum.com/cases/
behance: https://www.behance.net/Turumburum
